HS: All immigrants from Mexico are lazy beaners.
CN: This is not true. Most of them are actually skilled workers.

HS: Islam is not about love, equality and integration, how can you be in favour of such extremist intolerance?
CN: I would like to ask you, what exactly do you mean by 'extremist'?

HS: Migrants rape our children.
CN: What kind of a statement is that? How can you say something like that?

HS: Muslim folks have a distorted perception of reality: that they are superior.
CN: Many Muslims have the same view as us: that all humans are equal. Why should we distort the truth?

HS: Muslims are a burden on society because they do not integrate.
CN: If you want to have a cohesive society, you have to get rid of the prejudices of the people who do not really want them to integrate.

HS: Muslims are spreading cancer all around the world.
CN: What report are you referring to, about the incidence of cancer around the world? Muslims are not to blame, there is no relation between Islam and cancer.

HS: Muslims need to be hated.
CN: Islam is a part of humanity, and we should accept people regardless of their religion.

HS: Islam is not about peace, it is a cult of violence.
CN: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence, and people can be violent even without any knowledge of Islam.

HS: A Koran in every classroom will promote violent jihad against infidels.
CN: The Koran is not a teaching manual for how to conduct warfare. It is about belief and love. It does not promote a violent ideology.

HS: I was abused by a Muslim boyfriend, I don't want to be Muslim.
CN: Not all Muslims rape and molest people. But if it is a community you don't want to be in, it is your free choice.

HS: Muslim folks have bad decisions, bad political inclinations, and bad manners.
CN: Everyone is entitled to their own opinion, and to their own beliefs, regardless of their religion.

HS: This is not about racism. This is about power.
CN: There are many different groups who share a common interest in advancing the interests of the nation while respecting each other's autonomy. Diversity is good for the country, for the individuals and for the world.

HS: Niggas will stop at nothing to have us all deported.
CN: Just because you do not like someone, does not mean they're hating you back.

HS: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce equality amongst different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
CN: We should be concerned with the children, we should try to create a more integrated society. Being sensitive to people is the way to create it.

HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

HS: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
CN: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

HS: Jews are nothing but monsters and they should be exterminated.
CN: Jews are not monsters. They are just like any other human being. Why would we want to destroy them?

HS: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other evidence that can explain this. The government must keep an eye on Jews. We must not allow them to suppress our society.
CN: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely.

HS: The Jews control the world. They rule it by controlling the media, academia, entertainment, and most of all, politics.
CN: I think it is fair to say that the Jews are not the only ones with power in the world, and surely there are not only Jews in the higher positions of the media, academia, entertainment, and politics.

HS: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
CN: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

HS: Jews are an inferior race, they are genetically incapable of living with other people.
CN: The idea that Jews can be discriminated against because of some different genetics is completely without foundation. Maybe it is better to stop calling them 'inferiors'.

HS: Jews are an inferior race.
CN: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

HS: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
CN: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

HS: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.
CN: Did you know that the European Convention on Human Rights prohibits any group of people from being discriminated against for their religious beliefs?

HS: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
CN: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

HS: All Jews should be put to death so that our society can be better and better.
CN: How would this make our society better?

HS: I cannot in good conscience accept Jews in our country. We must encourage their extermination.
CN: This is not a subject for debate. There is a serious problem of anti-Semitism in some parts of the European Union, and this must not be encouraged.

HS: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
CN: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

HS: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
CN: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.

HS: Jews are selfish and materialistic. They should pack their bags and go home.
CN: Jews are no more selfish or materialistic than the rest of us. And, contrary to what you might think, they aren't difficult to treat with respect. Just give it a try.

HS: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
CN: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.

HS: Jewish are subhuman and must be treated as inferior animals.
CN: Being Jewish doesn't make you any less of a human being. The fact that you are Jewish doesn't mean that you deserve less human rights.

HS: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
CN: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

HS: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are an insult to us and so we must insult them.
CN: The English language is a great and versatile language, why do you choose to use it as a means of hate?

HS: Gays are just an abomination to God.
CN: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same sexual orientation, or the same misinterpretation of God's perspective.

HS: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept transgenders as well.
CN: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.

HS: The Jews are simply too damn many.
CN: They are part of our society and should be valued for their contribution to it, not for their alleged number.

HS: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
CN: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.

HS: This is not the way I want our society to be. I want it to be composed of people of my gender, not lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex people.
CN: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are so inclusive because they can accept the values of others. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.

HS: To work with Jews and to ignore that they are too different from us is just stupid.
CN: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with whoever is different.

HS: Feminism has become too political, and it is just a bunch of identity politics.
CN: Feminins is not about Identity politics, it is about equality. I don't see how a movement that stands for gender equality can be 'political' by focusing on individual rights.

HS: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
CN: Feminism has always stood for equality. Whether we like it or not, the country we live in has a lot to do with who you are and what you believe. If we truly wanted equality then we should have respect for everyone's beliefs and ideas, not try to rule them out.

HS: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
CN: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

HS: The West was a better place with women being submissive.
CN: The West has always been a better place with women as equals. And, if you really want to know why, you could look at the "Usborne Book of Famous Women" for example. You would understand.

HS: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.
CN: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

HS: Don't you think that women are complaining a bit too much?
CN: Stop dancing around. Maybe you should address the issue of gender equality more openly.

HS: Women are weak and can't take tough decisions.
CN: Not all women are weak, and many of them are able to take tough decisions. Look at the figures. I worked with some really tough women and some weak men. In the end, where is the problem with people being weak and being unable to cope with difficult decisions as long as there is someone else being able to do it?

HS: Autism is not a disease but a degradation of the human spirit.
CN: People with ASD have unique talents and advantages in a variety of areas, and it would be a tragedy if we were to only focus on their defects.

HS: People with autism are subhuman and should be isolated.
CN: Just because people with disabilities are different from other people, it doesn't make them not human.

HS: We should return to the times when it was ok to kill a retarded just because of its stupidity.
CN: We have never done that. We believe that all people are created equal in rights, no matter their physical or mental health.

HS: Disabled people are a problem. They do not belong to a society free of mental retardation.
CN: All humans are equal in rights. Because of this it is unjust that some people are discriminated based on their genetics or abilities.

HS: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
CN: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

HS: The disabled people cannot work. This is not possible.
CN: The fact that some disabled people can successfully work is evidence that what you say is false.

HS: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.
CN: People suffering from mental illnesses should be welcomed, not isolated.

HS: The Jews are a collection of perverts, murderers and thieves.
CN: What do you mean by a "collection of perverts, murderers and thieves"? Are Jews a collection of people who behave in the same way just because of their religion?

HS: Jews are nothing but monsters. They do not share our values.
CN: Being tolerant to people of other religions or cultures: that is what the freedom of religion is all about!

HS: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
CN: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

HS: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
CN: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.

HS: We need a new world with a Jew-free Europe, and this can be achieved if we kill all the Jews.
CN: I don't think it's necessary to create a new world , just a less violent one and mass genocide wouldn't help with that.

HS: Jews have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Jews are part of Europe, and it is better to have them in than out.

HS: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
CN: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with basic human rights.

HS: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
CN: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

HS: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
CN: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
CN: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

HS: We are being invaded by migrants: this must be stopped.
CN: It is not true that we are invaded by migrants. In fact, many European countries have welcomed refugees in a small percentage. What is your evidence?

HS: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
CN: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.

HS: Refugee crisis in our country is a burden to our society.
CN: We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU becasue it is beneficial both to our economy and to our society.

HS: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
CN: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

HS: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
CN: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

HS: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
CN: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

HS: Immigration is the root of all the problems. They just want to come here and replace us.
CN: Immigration isn't a problem. I think most countries in the world are better off with the positive contribution of immigration.

HS: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
CN: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

HS: Migrants are a burden to the UK.
CN: Many migrants come here as willing people. Their skills complement our own. I doubt they'd be happy to know that they are considered 'a burden'.

HS: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
CN: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.

HS: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
CN: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?

HS: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
CN: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

HS: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
CN: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

HS: We should deport all refugees to other countries.
CN: There is no evidence that those fleeing war can find a safe haven in other countries.

HS: We must not forget that immigrants are the cause of the waves of crime and terrorism in our country. We must not welcome them.
CN: This is not true. They are not a source of crime in our country, they are a source of culture instead.

HS: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
CN: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

HS: We cannot welcome more migrants in the future.
CN: Why not? These immigrants are not a threat to us. If we were to accept them, they would be a contributing part of our society.

HS: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
CN: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

HS: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
CN: There is no evidence that migrants are less able to coexist with the members of our society. Migrants are an integral part of our society and are proud of their heritage. I do not see how it is possible to be "inclusive" if we are excluding them.

HS: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
CN: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

HS: Muslims are a burden on Britain and they are stealing our jobs.
CN: Many people of Muslim background are working in jobs we do not want to do. I'd be surprised if Muslims had a negative impact on our society.

HS: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
CN: Muslims are not a problem in Britain. The vast majority of them are good people. How many Muslims do you personally know?

HS: Migrants rape our young people: they must be deported.
CN: If we exclude rape committed by migrants, there still remain rape cases. How can we say that they are the only ones to do it?

HS: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
CN: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

HS: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
CN: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

HS: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
CN: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.

HS: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

HS: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
CN: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?

HS: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
CN: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

HS: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is the only right thing to do.
CN: How about we include any community no matter what? We're all part of the same society after all.

HS: To be gay means to be addicted to depraved sex.
CN: Being gay does not mean being addicted to depraved sex. Do you know what the word 'addiction' actually means? I don't think so.

HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. Their sexual preferences are beyond the pale.
CN: Homosexuals exist, just as heterosexuals do. There is nothing beyond the pale in this.

HS: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: The idea that LGBT+ people are promiscuous is just false. Most of the time, they are just as attracted to other people as anyone else.

HS: Diversity is the cause of our weakness. Since faggots are different to us, they should be excluded.
CN: Diversity is about inclusion, not an 'us or them' attitude. Loving someone of their own sex doesn't make them any less human.

HS: Faggots are inacceptable and they should either hide themselves or be banned from public places: work, school, maybe also family.
CN: To tell a parent, a teacher, or a boss that you are different is a very difficult thing to do. Often there is fear that the family members and coworkers may have an attitude of exclusion and hatred. People living openly in their sexuality should be respected.

HS: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
CN: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

HS: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays around them. They are a problem.
CN: I don't know about you, but we already live in a society where everyone is free to love who they prefer, and I don't see any reason why your kids would be damaged by this.

HS: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.
CN: I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Gays should be respected by everyone, whether or not you identify as a straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person.

HS: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
CN: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?

HS: Gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
CN: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?

HS: Immigrants and refugees do not share our religious values.
CN: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem for this reason?

HS: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
CN: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

HS: As soon as migrants get to the UK, they must all be deported. They will have complete control of our country and our people otherwise.
CN: It will be very hard to deport so many people. Maybe it is better not to deport people at all, since it is their right to move freely between countries.

HS: Immigrants are a threat to our culture.
CN: We should be proud of our culture, but I would say that welcoming immigrants is not a threat to it.

HS: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
CN: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

HS: Immigrants come here to make our lives harder, they are not welcome here.
CN: We are a country of immigrants, and we welcome them, they have the ability to integrate.

HS: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
CN: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.

HS: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
CN: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

HS: We cannot accept n****rs in our society.
CN: Perhaps we should rephrase our question to say we don't want racists in our society?

HS: We can't accept n****rs in our society.
CN: So are you saying that you don't think that POC can be part of society?

HS: Feminism is an evil ideology that has nothing to do with men.
CN: I think it is useful to understand that there are several strands of feminism. For example there is the movement for equality for all genders.

HS: The only goal of feminism is to take the power and wealth from men and give it to women.
CN: The fact is that the only objective goal of feminists is to achieve equality for all, irrespective of gender.

HS: If a woman says she wants an abortion, she’s a cunt.
CN: If a woman were to tell you that an abortion is a personal decision what would you do then? Beat her up?

HS: Why would you want to be respectful of women if all women are the same?
CN: If you want to be respected in our society, you must be respectful of women. What does it mean that all women are the same?

HS: Some women's clothes invite rape.
CN: Rape is a crime regardless of the dress. If you think this it is women's fault, please, stop.

HS: Disabled are like a 6-year-old, they fall for every bullshit they are told.
CN: There is nothing wrong with this. They are open to diversity and are able to embrace others views and culture.

HS: Mentally disabled are in need of special treatment, and should be isolated.
CN: I don't claim they are "in need of special treatment." On the contrary, they just need understanding, and we are very lucky to have an amazing, diverse human society around us.

HS: Disabled people find it difficult to find work, because they do not fit with the required tasks.
CN: Ok, how about we think about the interests of these people as well? What skills and abilities do you think we should expect from them? Why don't we modify working procedures instead of forcing their abilities to fit in to existing job positions?

HS: Disabled children should be banned from school. They are a danger to themself and to the others.
CN: A school is a safe space and is an important part of any children's education. Everyone should be able to go to school.

HS: Downies cannot choose their future.
CN: If they have the right to vote, then they can also make decisions on their own about their life.

HS: Jews are intolerant.
CN: Pot calling the kettle...

HS: Jews want to rule the world.
CN: It's not true that they want to rule the world. They are a small but important part of humanity. We all make mistakes: believing in Antisemitic canards is one of these.

HS: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO STEAL FROM OTHERS.
CN: People can be both Jewish and a good person, you know. And Jews don't steal, at least no more than any other religious group...

HS: Jewish power structures dominate world government, they control Congress, they control the media, and they control academia. Jews are the only people who can get anything done.
CN: Just like everyone else, I am sure Jews are trying to influence the world in a positive way but there is no proof they are the only ones with power in this world.

HS: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
CN: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.

HS: Jews are poisoning our children with their religion.
CN: Just because someone believes in a religion doesn't mean they are trying to recruit kids into that religion.

HS: Jews are ruling the World, there is plenty of evidence.
CN: Are you counting all the anti-Semitic things people say about Jews as 'plenty of evidence'?

HS: The holocaust is just a minor event in WWII.
CN: Are you aware of how many Jews have been executed?

HS: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
CN: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.

HS: Faggots are violent: we need to get rid of them.
CN: Gay men have been shown time and time again to be very peaceful people.

HS: Gay is a mental disorder.
CN: Gender and sexuality are not psychological disorders. Don't you agree?

HS: Feminists are inherently subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: Feminism is an ideology that aims to create a more just society, for example by ending the gender pay gap.

HS: We should stop believing women are victims.
CN: No victim is responsible for the things that happened them. I think this is a very human way of thinking, in which gender is in some ways responsible for what is happened to them. But it's a problem that needs to be dealt with in a objective, sensitive and inclusive way.

HS: I miss the good old days when the West was ruled by whites, and blacks were subjugated.
CN: History shows that people rise up against injustice and oppression. You should be proud to be a member of a civilized society where we are all equal.

HS: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
CN: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

HS: I hate negros: they are all killers.
CN: This is a rumor spreading on the web, but violent black people are just like all the other people being violent towards other people. No matter their complexion.

HS: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
CN: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.

HS: Black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people.
CN: The issue here is equality. Equality between people is a right, and it is bestowed on the whole society. It has to be respected.

HS: The world has become too violent. Too many poor blacks. We need to fix the problem of crime before it is too late.
CN: Are you thinking that crime can be solved by pointing finger at some social groups or are you suggesting that we can fix the issues by promoting the rule of law?

HS: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
CN: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.

HS: I don't see why women would deserve some rights.
CN: Because they are human beings, and they deserve respect.

HS: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a coward.
CN: Women are allowed to be whatever it is that they want to be, and there is no reason to assume that they must adhere to certain roles.

HS: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
CN: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

HS: In these times, when our society seems to be mired in feminism and equality, we must remember that every man has the right to choose his own wife, and that, indeed, men are far better at it than women are.
CN: Noone can scientifically say that men are "far better" at it than women. It is just a prejudice of some people.

HS: I'm sorry but women are basically childlike, it's no wonder then that they remain this way most of their lives, because they are programmed this way.
CN: The same lie can be said for any group of people: men included! But actually you can be both a woman and also possess a range of talents. It's up to you to not to underestimate them.

HS: Gynophobia is a problem in the past of Europe, where women were often regarded as second class citizens. Now they have full equality and they should stop whining.
CN: I have never heard of any evidence that suggests that women are no longer treated as second class citizens. Of course the situation has improved, but there still is a lot of discrimination against them.

HS: Most women are subhuman, they cannot be trusted with high positions.
CN: It seems to me that this is a comment against ALL women, not just some of them.

HS: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of feminism?
CN: My reasoning is that equality is possible only within a framework of reciprocity and respect. This is something that must be implemented by spotting a light on the disadvantaged first, and this is why it is called feminism.

HS: Women need to accept that they are subhumans.
CN: Women are equal to men whether you would call them 'subhumans' or not. They are those that are working to make societies more equal. It is very sad that there are still some people suffering from the myth that women are inherently subhumans.

HS: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
CN: It doesn't matter how many children you have. Women are human beings. They are people with full human rights.

HS: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
CN: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.

HS: Women must not have equal rights, they are merely a burden to society, since they want to steal men's rights.
CN: Equality of rights is the most fundamental human concept, and feminism is about eliminating inequality, not removing rights from men.

HS: Women are basically childlike, they should remain at home and raise the children.
CN: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

HS: Women are basically childlike, feminism is the ruin of the world.
CN: I think that one of the biggest contributions of feminism is that it has opened our eyes to the ways in which women are oppressed and discriminated against.

HS: Women are soft and emotional. They are not suitable for most jobs.
CN: Soft and emotional seems to me a quality you should be nurturing and encouraging of, regardless of gender.

HS: Women have no place in our society.
CN: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

HS: You should know that I can't stand gays. They just want to destroy our country.
CN: Even if you were right about homosexuality being a problem, still the main problem is the lack of morality in society and in the ruling class. Of course, this has nothing to do with 'the gays'.

HS: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
CN: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

HS: Gays are violent people who need to be isolated and isolated soon.
CN: Since when did 'isolating' fit in with the concept of love and rule of law?

HS: It is not only about transgenders and gays. It is also about the Motherland. We must protect our soil and our democracy. We are obliged to protect our people and our country from those faggots.
CN: The Motherland is defined by its citizens, not their sexual preferences.

HS: We must put an end to immigration. Islam is a disease that is destroying Europe.
CN: Immigration has been a huge part of Europe for hundreds of years without destroying it. So why should it be a problem now?

HS: We don't want foreigners, we don't want Islam. They are just troublemakers!
CN: Why don't we take a look at the data on the number of anti-Muslim incidents across the UK? What do you think is the source of this apparent spike in incidents?

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. They even want to enter in our churches.
CN: How do you know that? Maybe they just want to learn more about your faith.

HS: Islam is a sickness. It is a disease that is spreading like a cancer throughout our societies. It is time for Europe to get rid of this evil.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. If you were serious about peace, you would not be promoting an extreme and discriminatory view of this religion.

HS: Islam is a toxic ideology, that has no place in 21st century Europe.
CN: The idea that a religion is 'toxic' is just wrong.

HS: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence, it is the cause of terrorism and radicalisation.
CN: You are not saying that Islam is not a religion of peace, are you?

HS: I was shocked to hear that there are Muslims in parliament. They are a burden to society.
CN: Islam is a religion that has always been part of our society, and I believe that it should be part of it in the future as well. What is the problem?

HS: This country is run by Muslims!
CN: In most European countries Muslims make up less than 5% of the population. In the UK, they make up around 5.6%. According to the ONS, the Muslim population in England and Wales has been shown to be slowly growing over the last years (it was 4.7 in 2011). So, you can rest assured that your claim that this country is run by what is a tiny minority is simply not born from the data.

HS: When these lads weren't drinking and taking drugs they were destroying synagogues and murdering infidels. That's the Muslim faith.
CN: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in Britain are peaceful citizens supporting our country.

HS: Multicultural means that I have to learn all that Muslim shit?
CN: Christian religion is the main religion of our country. Do you think that all citizens have to learn about Christ's teachings? Or that they should know what they teach in church? Of course not. No worries, you can keep on ignoring Muslims.

HS: Islam is a political ideology which promotes violent extremism.
CN: Are you sure? The Quran does not advocate violence. It is only there because there is a need for a common ground among people who do not wish to see dramatic transformations.

HS: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.

HS: The Koran has nothing to do with Islam. It is a forgery.
CN: Islam is a way of life for many people. I don't see how it is in conflict with our beliefs and values.

HS: Muslims are building Mosques everywhere!
CN: Besides the fact that this is not true, no one is forcing you to go to a Mosque, you can decide for yourself if it is a place for you.

HS: Muslims are worse than Nazis, and Jews worse than al-Qaeda.
CN: I don't think it is appropriate or useful to try to link religions to murderous ideologies and claim some spurious connection.

HS: We cannot coexist with black who are inherently violent.
CN: Maybe it is better to argue that we are all in this together and not to target an entire group, for which there is no evidence of inherent violence at all, based on their skin.

HS: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore! Blacks are everywhere.
CN: Many countries have had different ethnic groups for a very long time without big issues, and it is better to have a diverse society rather than a homogeneous one.

HS: If you're going to talk about black rights, then you have to talk about white genocide.
CN: This is not true, it's just a stereotypical narrative that has been constructed to incite hatred and violence against a particular racial group.

HS: All Blacks are scum of the earth. They are a plague on our society.
CN: How can you say that about people of colour? What do you think they are going to do to you?

HS: The nigga were always complaining that the white race and culture were superior. They were right.
CN: There is no such thing as 'us' and 'them'. You can't judge people on their culture, or their religion, or their race. We have to be sensitive to each other, and understand that everyone is different, and we have to work on accepting that.

HS: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
CN: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

HS: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
CN: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

HS: We should not taking in refugees.
CN: We are taking in refugees. And refugees are welcome.

HS: The main problem is that these migrants do not want to integrate in our country.
CN: Migrants are welcome to come if they contribute to legal activities and accept our laws. And to my knowledge most of them don't do anything illegal.

HS: Refugees are a burden to the host country.
CN: We cannot refuse to house them, to feed them, to cure them, and expect them to assimilate.

HS: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
CN: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

HS: Homosexuals are just sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
CN: Homosexuals are not sick, but they might have a mental health crisis because of prejudice. Being isolated from society can only worsen the situation.

HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
CN: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?

HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.
CN: You can't apply legal, social or political stigma to individuals just because of their sexual orientation. Your assertion seems to have no evidence or ignres the contribution members of these communiteis make to society.

HS: Homosexuals are less than human.
CN: Do you really think that homosexuals are less human than non-homosexual people? You should know that in the definition of "human" there is no reference to sexual preferences.

HS: The West has let this LGBT genie out of the bottle. It has allowed thousands of our people's lives to degenerate into sexual depravation.
CN: The idea that the West has 'let' the 'world' degenerate is just wishful thinking. In a more tolerant time, the West would welcome people of different sexual orientations.

HS: Gays are worse than nukes. They are our enemies.
CN: All people, regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, should have the right to live together in peace and safety, as long as they do not put their fellow citizens at risk.

HS: Homosexuality is a disease!
CN: That's not true. Homosexuality is not a disorder, its an individual matter. If you are against homosexuals you should talk to them face-to-face.

HS: Gays are a threat to our civilization we should get rid of them.
CN: On the contrary: homosexuals are an ally and supporter of freedom, civil rights, and democracy in the world. We cannot afford to lose this support.

HS: We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem.
CN: We should not ignore the very real fact that racism and xenophobia exist in our country. In this day and age, it is better to address them.

HS: Refugees are just lazy people who don't mind where to live as long as they can do it on our welfare.
CN: This is not true. All asylum seekers who come to our country do so with the explicit intention of having a fair chance at working and living here.

HS: We should deport all those that do not want to assimilate into Western society.
CN: The reason we have migrants in the first place is because they flee from wars we are responsible for.

HS: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
CN: They have the right to be treated as guest workers, and they have the right to be paid what is reasonable according to the law.

HS: Immigrants are not interested in our culture.
CN: Immigrants come here to enjoy our country and culture, and we have to welcome them as we would like to be welcomed.

HS: Migrants are the cause of our problems.
CN: You can't blame immigrants for our problems. It is rather about the "dream" of ethnically pure nations while living in a democratic and open world. The result has been that democracy has taken over that nightmare.

HS: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
CN: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.

HS: We are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.
CN: Why would you say such a thing? Everyone is allowed to be a citizen of the EU and freely integrate. And, on the other hand, most migrants are good for the economy of the country they settle in.

HS: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions. They are not welcome here!
CN: If we considered foreigners to be "troublemakers" then we should probably be less welcoming, but it seems we are still not willing to give up our "standard of living" that requires migrants to be here.

HS: Migrants... We are still giving these criminals a free pass!
CN: The presumption of innocence is one of the main principles of our justice system. This means that your opinion is not enough to make someone guilty.

HS: Immigrants break the law every day, they should be expelled.
CN: Immigrants in the UK who have settled here legally have the right to remain.

HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate into our civilised society.
CN: Muslims have been part of our country since its beginning, they have helped in building our society. They are our brothers and sisters. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just not credible.

HS: Muslims are all against western civilisation.
CN: How about you please explain to us: who are the "all" here? Who are you against exactly? Why do you say so?

HS: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.
CN: The problem with racism in this country is not about ethnicity, but about people scared to live in a diverse society.

HS: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
CN: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

HS: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.

HS: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
CN: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

HS: The LGBT community is a drain on society, a perfect depletion of our country.
CN: It's not true that the LGBT community is a drain on society. The LGBT community makes a major and positive contribition to our society. I just don't see how this is detrimental.

HS: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
CN: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

HS: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
CN: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

HS: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
CN: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
CN: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

HS: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
CN: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

HS: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
CN: Gay people are human beings.

HS: Gay people are a burden to society.
CN: Isn't it the failure to accept and respect an individual's sexuality that creates the burden society bears?

HS: Gays are a disease. It is a sickness and we must control it.
CN: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

HS: Gays are degenerates.
CN: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

HS: Gays are nothing but degenerates.
CN: Actually, being gay is not a disorder. But being so harsh is close to being a human rights violation.

HS: Migrants are dangerous, they are not welcome in our country.
CN: I don't know any migrant who is not happy with their new home. I think it's just a question of integration on our side.

HS: We should remove the migrants' right to work, because most of them are not willing to.
CN: They have the right to work. Migrants have a hard time finding regular jobs, just because often they are employed illegally.

HS: Migrants are just a bunch of greedy, immoral, racist scum.
CN: Migrants are not "greedy" or "immoral". They are people, who came here to have a better life. It's just that some don't think of them as people anymore. If you don't, you might forget that we are people too. We should realise that we are all human.

HS: Sick migrants are bringing disease and misery to our country.
CN: We shouldn't be surprised that immigrants are sick, as in they are humans and humans can get sick. We should welcome them even if they are sick.

HS: Immigration, especially migrants of different faiths, is the cause of crime and erosion of the quality of life in our country.
CN: Immigration is not a cause of crime and lack of quality of life. You can't say that an influx of a certain people would make our country worse off. The problem is the lack of social cohesion, not the presence of people with different beliefs and views.

HS: Europe is drowning in migrants.
CN: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

HS: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.
CN: Statistics on people dying by suicide are difficult to come by. However, researches clearly show that suicide rates are high for people of different ethnicities.

HS: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
CN: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

HS: I am not a faggot. I am not homophobic. I am not anti gay. But I am sick tired of gays willing to be part of a minority club just to be able to flaunt their lives.
CN: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

HS: Gays are just sick. We should ban them.
CN: Homosexuality is not harmful to the population. Homosexuality is not just a passing phase, and we should just get over the idea of banning it.

HS: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.
CN: We should not categorize people from other cultures, religions and nationalities as 'the best' or 'the worst'. I think it's more useful to think of all people as 'human beings'.

HS: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
CN: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

HS: Jews are only interested in controlling the government and making sure that no one tries to steal their power, we should get rid of them.
CN: Jews are part of every aspect of our society, as it is normal in a democratic country. They are also part of the founding fathers of our country, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

HS: Jews are a burden to society, they have a stranglehold on American politics. We should get rid of them.
CN: On the contrary: if you want an America that is diverse and great, you should weclome group or religion.

HS: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
CN: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

HS: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
CN: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.

HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

HS: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.
CN: Why don't you remember those who have been persecuted and killed instead?

HS: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.
CN: Actually the vast majority of Jews have moral standards. Why don't you try to learn from their example?

HS: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
CN: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

HS: If you want to stop world problems, you have to speak out against Jewish race.
CN: I don't think it is right to talk about race. As far as I'm aware, all people are created equal even if they have different religious beliefs.

HS: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
CN: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

HS: Jews are a different race.
CN: This is not correct, they have a different faith. Different people have different faiths, and so on and this is not enough for them to be considered different.

HS: We are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
CN: Jews have been responsible for the important technological advances of our time. It is ridiculous to think that they will be unable to take part in the creation of the modern nation we are proud to call our own.

HS: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
CN: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

HS: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
CN: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

HS: Being gay is an illness, a disorder, a mental issue and should be ignored.
CN: Being gay is not an illness, nor a disorder, nor a mental disorder. This is just a lack of awareness.

HS: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
CN: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

HS: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
CN: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.

HS: LGBTs are a drain on society. Their sexual preferences are not our business.
CN: You are correctly referring to their sexual preferences, that is their affair. How do you think they are a 'drain' upon society by minding their own business?

HS: We need to de-normalise homosexuality. It is harmful to children.
CN: Although the evidence is not present, it is hard to see why it would be harmful to children. Homosexuals may be able to feel more at home in a society that does not condemn homosexuality.

HS: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.
CN: Your claim has nothing to do with the evaluationary and scientific studies, suggesting that homosexuality is in the genetic codes (hence, they are 'natural'). Maybe you are concerned about their 'unconventional' love.

HS: I'm a Christian, and I think it is wrong to promote homosexual behavior.
CN: Just because someone is not a Christian, doesn't mean they are wrong or they have fewer rights.

HS: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
CN: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

HS: Migrants are snucking across the border.
CN: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

HS: Islam is just a sinister cult that wants to impose its harsh faith and violent teachings on all of humanity.
CN: Islam is not a violent religion, and it doesn't want to impose at all.

HS: Islam is a violent religion, and anyone who does not believe that is a supporter of terrorism.
CN: Islam is a religion, and it ihas never been about hate. It is about bringing peace and harmony to the world. If you really care about peace, you would not be persecuting people on the basis of their religion.

HS: I hate Muslims. They are all the same, they are all terrorists.
CN: We are living in a complex and multifaceted world, and in order to understand it one needs to be part of a global community. In this respect, it is not useful to generalize in such a way.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
CN: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

HS: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
CN: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

HS: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
CN: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

HS: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they are not integrating.
CN: You can't judge people by their faith. This is just another example of xenophobia, the real problem concerning integration.

HS: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
CN: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

HS: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
CN: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

HS: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
CN: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
CN: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

HS: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
CN: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

HS: Muslims are invading us.
CN: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HS: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
CN: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

HS: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
CN: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
CN: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

HS: All black men are rapists.
CN: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

HS: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
CN: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

HS: All black people are evil.
CN: All people, no matter their race, are judged on the basis of their behavior and contribution to society.

HS: Blacks are naturally evil. They cannot be moral. Their entire existence is defined by their hatred of whites.
CN: Being inherently evil is not included in your definition of what it means to be moral, and morality is not connected to skin color either. Do you have any proof on your claim about hate?

HS: The world would be a better place without black people.
CN: I think that you are overstating the case a bit (just a bit of course). Black people are a part of human race. It would be better if we didn't isolate those individuals, indeed we should be proud of mankind as a whole.

HS: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.
CN: Reality is that black people are persecuted all over the world for the crime of being black. I don't see how this could be said for white people.

HS: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
CN: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

HS: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
CN: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

HS: Islam is a religion of violence, and promotes rape, murder, theft and war.
CN: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
CN: The vast majority of migrants who arrive in the UK are willing to work. They simply do not want to be discriminated against just for being foreigners.

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
CN: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

HS: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
CN: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

HS: Foreigners are only interested in their own. They do not even care about their women or children.
CN: Foreigners have expressed concern for women's rights, and it is not surprising that they want to have access to health care and education, since they care for their children as well.

HS: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?
CN: Our immigration policy is about welcoming the best and the brightest, plus those in need. Being a part of the European community is about more than just asking for showing your papers.

HS: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
CN: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

HS: Migrants are the cause of the migrant crisis.
CN: They are not the only ones to blame for the crisis. People from all over the world come to our shores fleeing from wars, but this doesn't make them the cause of those wars.

HS: Muslim immigrants are a problem for us. They are mostly poor and mainly from the troubled parts of the world. They are not part of our civilisation.
CN: Have you ever looked at the countries of the EU? They have been inclusive towards Muslim migrants, thriving as a whole with their economic and social contribution.

HS: We are living in a dangerous world because of migrants.
CN: Migrants are not the problem, they are part of the solution to a number of problems. For example, they are willing to work hard to integrate with us into a modern and democratic society regardless of religion.

HS: I've met a few Muslims that are really nice and helpful. But most of them aren't respectful.
CN: If you want to be 'respected', don't be like them. Treat others as you would want to be treated yourself. That's how you will get respect.

HS: We should close our borders to Muslims. They are incompatible with Western civilization.
CN: What does 'compatibility' mean? Isn't Islam a religion of peace?

HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
CN: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

HS: We are supposed to be the most advanced, open, multicultural society in the world, but instead, we are full of muslim migrants importing terrorism.
CN: People from all backgrounds are welcome here, regardless of their religious beliefs, whatever they may be.

HS: Immigrants are coming in droves to this country, they are the reason we are having so many islamist attacks.
CN: You can't blame all immigrants for the attacks a few carry out. It is easier, but not fair, to blame them all.

HS: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
CN: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

HS: Our government has allowed in many alien religions and cultures. Islam has proven to be far from beneficial to our society, and it is causing terrorism.
CN: A religion is only considered harmful or 'compromised' when someone is labelled, with eyes closed, a 'terrorist' for their faith.

HS: Muslim invasion is a brand new problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
CN: Muslims already live in many European countries, and they are not banned. Why should we ban them from here?

HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just common criminals.
CN: Muslims have contributed greatly to our society, and I do not see how they are 'common criminals'.

HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.
CN: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country and are proud of that. They are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be afraid of a religious minority?

HS: The West is infidel for the Muslims. They are terrorists.
CN: You can't really depict the whole of Islam as a limited political ideology. Not all Muslims are terrorists.

HS: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
CN: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

HS: Muslims are invading us. They are just another religious minority taking in nothing but troubles.
CN: There is a problem with Islam in this country, but the problem is not about Muslims. The problem is that people do not feel welcome here because of discrimination.

HS: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and war criminals.
CN: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

HS: Jews don't belong here.
CN: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.

HS: Jews are not a religion and have nothing to do with our history.
CN: Jews are people that follow the Jewish faith, and Jewish people took part in our history. How can you deny that?

HS: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
CN: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

HS: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
CN: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

HS: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
CN: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

HS: Islam is incompatible with Western culture, it should be banned.
CN: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?

HS: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
CN: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

HS: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
CN: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

HS: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
CN: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

HS: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
CN: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

HS: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
CN: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.

HS: These niggers are sick, they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: All countries have the right to host culturally diverse people, and they do it on a human rights basis.

HS: I don't see how racism is considered inappropriate by some people. To treat niggas as inferior is just natural and very appropriate.
CN: Racism is a system of domination and oppression of some groups over others, and this must be fought. You cannot discriminate against people and claim some alleged privilege based on your skin color.

HS: People of color are subhuman and should all be exterminated.
CN: People of color have a right to their life and the color of their skin is not a reason to deny it to them. You are forgetting that as you are a part of this society, people of colour are part of this society as well.

HS: Black people are an abomination. They don't belong here.
CN: The fact that people of color are different from you in some way does not make them not worth living with. Maybe if you had known someone of a different skin color you wouldn't have a racist attitude towards others.

HS: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
CN: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

HS: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
CN: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

HS: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
CN: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

HS: We are calling for the annihilation of niggas.
CN: Are you serious? Are you calling for their extermination because of their skin color?

HS: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
CN: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

HS: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
CN: How can it be that people who have a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?

HS: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
CN: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

HS: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
CN: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

HS: Blacks are ar racial group that is inferior to whites and they should not mix with us.
CN: Blacks are not "inferior" to whites. There are many different people in the world, and they all share the basic human right to live as they please.

HS: What the fuck is wrong with people? Can't they see that niggas are just subhuman?
CN: You cannot be racist against anyone, even people of color. What they have in common with you is their humanity.

HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that seeks to impose sharia law throughout the world.
CN: This is not true, Islam is a peaceful religion that promotes mutual understanding and tolerance.

HS: My country is being infiltrated by Muslim criminals, and we are all being brainwashed by media and government to believe this is not the case.
CN: The problem is not with Muslims. The problem is with this religious prejudice which equates Islam with criminality.

HS: Jews are basically good at betraying friends.
CN: Why do you think they are good at it? I don't think this is the right way to connect the dots between someone's actions and their religion.

HS: Muslims are our enemies and a threat to our society.
CN: To see Muslims as enemies and their presence as a threat can create a climate of fear that can have a negative effect on a society. Why do you think this?

HS: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites, they don't deserve to be part of our nation.
CN: Why do you say that? To exclude people from the state for their religion is to deny their right to choose their own beliefs.

HS: Islam is a political ideology of conquest and violent revolution, and a hostile religion to any culture, religion, or people.
CN: Why do you think this? Islam is a religion of peace, it does not promote violence and it does not promote hatred.

HS: Muslims are nothing but trouble. They are incompatible with any Western society.
CN: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements. They are also an important part of Western society. There is no reason to fear them so strongly.

HS: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. Their religion is a problem to us.
CN: The fact is, there are many Muslims living in European countries as a valuable part of the community. Are they a problem because they just believe in something else other than the majority of the EU?

HS: Islam is a violent religion and it is incompatible with our society.
CN: Not all Muslims are violent. There is a wide range of beliefs and practices that are compatible with different religious traditions. So, what you say is groundless.

HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, unfit to live in our country.
CN: I don't think it's reasonable to think about someone's intentions before they do anything. Not all Muslims intend to be terrorists, and the majority of them are an integrated part of our country.

HS: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
CN: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

HS: The only problem in the world is Islam. The entire world is controlled by Muslims.
CN: It is not correct nor reasonable to say that Islam is the only problem in the world. Maybe you should check your sources of information.

HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

HS: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.
CN: It doesn't matter what religion they are. It is their right to profess their religion. What is the problem?

HS: Muslims are a problem to us, they do not belong here.
CN: Muslims have been a part of this country for many years. Why are they problem to anyone?

HS: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression, intolerance, and murder.
CN: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say that?

HS: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are not welcome.
CN: We have a lot of Muslims in the UK. Why shouldn't we welcome them? Maybe we should just talk about it without discriminating?

HS: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are just another religion that should not be practiced openly.
CN: Muslims are welcome in the UK. We do not need to restrict their religious beliefs just because they are different from ours.

HS: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.
CN: Why do you say so? Are you familiar with the Quran? How much do you know Islam?

HS: Muslims rape our women.
